sourcesContent: import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardBody } from 'reactstrap' import { Circle, FeatureGroup, LayerGroup, LayersControl, MapContainer, Marker, Popup, Rectangle, TileLayer } from 'react-leaflet' const { BaseLayer, Overlay } = LayersControl const center = [51.505, -0.09] const rectangle = [ [51.49, -0.08], [51.5, -0.06] ] const MapLayerControl = () => { return ( Layer Control You're here.
